name: We Weren't The First
description:
Controls:

Move: WASD

Look around: Mouse

Turn on/turn off flashlight: Left click

All other interactions are done by walking up to the interactable object

Credits (People):

lordddd: 3D modeler, team leader

KLR: Music, sound design

PotatoNato: Programming, all the unity stuff

Emre_exe: Resources (Let Lordddd use his computer to make assets)

Credits (3D models):
